id: SEO Toolkit for Non-profits ⇢ Notion Template
name: SEO Toolkit for Non-profits ⇢ Notion Template
description: Maximize your nonprofit's online visibility with the SEO Toolkit for Nonprofits. This Notion template simplifies search engine optimization (SEO), empowering you to attract more visitors to your website without the need for paid ads. Learn the fundamentals of SEO and discover how to position your nonprofit as a trusted authority online.✨ Key features include: An SEO 101 guide to get your team up to speed on the basics. A goal-setting exercise to align your efforts with your website audit finding
features: AnSEO 101 guideto get your team up to speed on the basics.; Agoal-setting exerciseto align your efforts with your website audit findings.; Databases for trackinghigh-value keywordsand auditingbacklinks.; Easy-to-follow checklists fortechnical SEO,on-page SEO, andoff-page SEOstrategies.
